content: पाचन {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (नी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [पाचयति कर्तरि ल्युः पाच्यतेऽनेन करणे ल्युट् वा] {@--1@} Cooking. {@--2@} Ripening. {@--3@} Digestive. {@--4@} Softening, relaxing. {@--5@} Suppurative. --नः {@--1@} Fire. {@--2@} Sourness, acidity. --नं {@--1@} The act of cooking. {@--2@} The act of ripening. {@--3@} A dissolvent, digestive medicine. {@--4@} Causing a wound to close. {@--5@} Penance, expiation (प्रायश्चित्त). {@--6@} Infusion, decoction. {@--7@} Extracting extraneous substances from a wound. {@--8@} A cataplasm. {@--9@} A substance used in closing wounds or restraining bleeding.
